text:
Poly Labs- SF (www.polylabs.io) (www.angel.com/poly-labs/jobs)

Software Engineer- email tiffany@polylabs.io

Poly Labs is an early stage wearable tech company that is dedicated to creating wearables that actually help you unplug from your other devices so you can focus on what's important in life. We're creating Dingbot, your wearable advocate for living a smarter, safer, and simpler life.

We're looking for a Software Engineer to join us in the Wearable World Accelerator to cover the full software development cycle of our app. We need an ambitious go-getter and problem solver who has experience with app development in cross platform, such as Phonegap, and with UI and testing. The developer should have knowledge of Java, XML, HTML, CSS, Bootstrap, Swift, JavaScript, Bluetooth Protocol.

Check out the position on https://angel.co/poly-labs/jobs/83026-software-engineer and email tiffny@polylabs.io if interested.
